PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-04702016-06-10,  ,  ,  ,  INAC
ActMackenzie Valley Resource Management Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Northwest Territories Waters Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the NORTHWEST TERRITORIES WATERS REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure consistency with amended legislation; (2) ensure the new, reduced federal jurisdiction over water management in the Northwest Territories; (3) ensure that the provisions in the Regulations accurately reference their corresponding enabling provisions in the amended Mackenzie Valley Resource Management Act; and (4) correct references to the Canada Shipping Act, 2001.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0130 Publication Date: 2016-06-29
AttachmentsAttachment
